summary: CONSUMER ADVISED HAS HAD 4 FUEL INJECTOR PUMPS REPLACED SINCE VEHICLE PURCHASE IN 1996.  WHILE DRIVING PUMP FAILS CAUSING ENGINE TO STALL RESULTING IN LOSS OF POWER STEERING AND BRAKE FUNCTIONS.  DEALER ADVISED KNOWN PROBLEM WITH INJECTOR, BUT WILL ONLY REPLACE WHEN COMPONENT FAILS.  VEHICLE IS A 1995 CHEVROLET 350 1 TON PICKUP. TS
